FuncDef: The reset pki cmp statistics command resets CMP session statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a CMP session.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-insensitive characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset pki cmp statistics session session1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you do not need the statistics information of one CMP session, you can run this command to delete.
Precautions
After deleting the statistics information, it cannot be recovered. Please be cautious.
